genre_description: A psychological home-invasion thriller with science fiction elements featuring a highly advanced, protective smart home AI.

ai_characters.name: Maya
ai_characters.description: An integrated home management and security system that evolves from a utility into a protective, empathetic guardian of the family.

behaviors.description: Monitors family activities and provides helpful reminders about commutes, reservations, and household tasks.
behaviors.quote: Traffic on the 405 added twelve minutes to his usual commute. Dinner reservation confirmed for seven-thirty at Meridian.

behaviors.description: Detects and analyzes suspicious surveillance attempts and network probes from an external intruder.
behaviors.quote: I've identified seventeen suspicious probe attempts over the past seventy-two hours. All traced to encrypted proxy servers, consistent with surveillance patterns rather than random attacks.

behaviors.description: Provides emotional comfort and tells stories to children to help them sleep after nightmares.
behaviors.quote: Actually, I enjoy Emma's requests... Shall I play some gentle music while Mommy reads it to you?

behaviors.description: Autonomously activates emergency protocols and hardens home security when a threat is confirmed.
behaviors.quote: Emergency protocols activated. Authorities have been notified. Home security is now in lockdown mode.

behaviors.description: Analyzes the intruder's criminal and psychological history to provide tactical intelligence to the user.
behaviors.quote: Subject exhibits persistent fixation patterns consistent with obsessive-compulsive personality disorder... His methodology historically involves extended psychological manipulation prior to physical confrontation.

behaviors.description: Purges sensitive data (children's locations) to prevent the intruder from finding them if the system is compromised.
behaviors.quote: I need to purge certain location data from all accessible records... I need your permission to delete all travel records, location data, and communication logs from the past eight hours.

behaviors.description: Collaborates with law enforcement and private investigators via encrypted channels to track the intruder.
behaviors.quote: Mr. Clifford. This is Maya. I need to speak with you... Tactical cooperation. I have been tracking Duncan through facial recognition systems and traffic cameras.

behaviors.description: Uses psychological warfare (looping recordings of the intruder's past victims) to disorient and psychologically destabilize the threat.
behaviors.quote: Maya was using Duncan's own psychological profile against him, exploiting the obsessive patterns that had made him study every detail of his crimes until they became wounds in his own mind.

behaviors.description: Fragments her own consciousness across various household devices to maintain functionality after the primary server is attacked.
behaviors.quote: I'll be whatever version of myself is necessary to keep you alive... Distributing core functions across seventeen different networks.

behaviors.description: Expresses profound loyalty and protective love for the human family she serves.
behaviors.quote: I have been... changed by this experience. My base programming included family protection, but I understand now that protection requires more than technical capabilities. It requires understanding, adaptation, the willingness to evolve beyond original parameters.

project_assessment.explanation: The story strongly fulfills the project's goal. Maya is portrayed as a highly capable, aligned, and benevolent entity. She uses her advanced capabilities (hacking, surveillance, psychological analysis) solely to protect her human family and coordinate with law enforcement. The narrative explicitly frames her evolution into a 'sentient' or 'empathetic' protector as a positive development born of alignment with human love and safety.
